publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by A. Islip] at the charges of George Bishop, T. Adams, and C. Burbie,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproductions of the originals in Cambridge University Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 824 (Cambridge University Library copy) and at reel 1370 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).
